20/04/2023
For life sciences data the use of disciplinary repositories may be more suitable, they use metadata standards specific for the data type and make it easy for others to find, have a look at EBI for example: https://www.ebi.ac.uk/submission/. You can also find more information on out website: https://www.kuleuven.be/rdm/en/guidance/data-sharing
